title: Mine Action Assistance to Jordan &#38;#38; Lebanon 2010
description: Funding under this initiative provides support to Jordan, Lebanon and the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) Special Fund for the Disabled in 2009-10. Funding provided to the ICRC will support physical rehabilitation services for people with disability. The total value of this initiative is $1.5 million to be expensed during the 2009-10 financial year.
